Input:
แปลข้อความต่อไปนี้จาก ภาษาอีสาน เป็น ภาษาอังกฤษ ให้เจ้าแปลโดยตรงโดยบ่ต้องมีข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมใดๆ
ข้อความ: ซุมนักเรียนมักไปย่างเล่นนำอาจารย์ยามมื้อแลง ย้อนอากาศเย็นสบาย ได้ออกกำลังกายและป่าไม้รอบๆ หม่องย่างก็เฮ็ดให้อากาศดีหลายคัก
คำแปล:
Pred: The students like to go for a walk with the teacher in the evening because the weather is cool and comfortable. They get to exercise, and the surrounding forest makes the air very good.
Pred_Latin: The students like to go for a walk with the teacher in the evening because the weather is cool and comfortable. They get to exercise, and the surrounding forest makes the air very good.
Gold: The group of students enjoys going for evening walks with their teacher because the weather is cool. They get some exercise, and the surrounding trees along the path make the air feel very refreshing.

Input:

คำแปล:

Pred_Latin: I rode my motorcycle to buy coffee at the entrance of the alley, but found that my regular shop was closed. So I rode to a new shop, but it wasn't tasty at all. I won't buy from there again.
Gold: I rode my motorcycle to buy coffee at the entrance of the alley, only to find that my favorite shop was closed. So, I went to try a new place instead. It wasn't good at all. I wouldn't go buy it there again.

Input:

Input:

Gold: My friends all love traveling abroad, but I feel it's a waste of money. So, I’d rather go to the beach in Thailand instead. The weather is great, the prices are cheap—it’s so much better! I really don’t understand why people go abroad.
